trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of XML schemas.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class.
Adds an object to the end of the collection.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be added to the collection of objects.
The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
Adds an instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class to the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> object to be added to the end of the collection.
Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
The <xref:System.Uri> of the schema object.
The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.

The following list identifies situations in which the Compile method is called: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

- By the Wsdl.exe tool or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
- By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies.
Instead of calling the Compile method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.

A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> that specifies the callback method that handles errors and warnings during XML Schema validation, if the strict parameter is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the XML schemas in the collection using the Compile method of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that belongs to the specified namespace.
The namespace of the item to check for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> contains a specific schema.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to locate.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the collection contains the specified item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Copies the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, which starts at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the schemas copied from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the array where copying begins.
Locates in one of the XML schemas an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> of the specified name and type.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that specifies a fully qualified name with a namespace used to locate an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object in the collection.
The <xref:System.Type> of the object to find.

Possible types include: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.
Gets a collection of schemas that belong to the same namespace.
The method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
The namespace of the schemas to retrieve.
An <xref:System.Collections.IList> implementation that contains the schemas.
Searches for the specified schema and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to locate.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
Inserts a schema into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which `schema` should be inserted.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be inserted.
Gets a value that indicates whether the schemas have been compiled.
You can compile the schemas referenced in a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas> object by invoking the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the schemas have been compiled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Static method that determines whether the specified XML schema contains a custom <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, or its equivalent.
The `IsDataSet` attribute comes from the namespace `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata`.
The IsDataSet method is called by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure and does not need to be called directly.
The XML schema to check for an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified schema exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object at the specified index.
The index of the item to retrieve.
The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
Gets a specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents the XML schema associated with the specified namespace.
The namespace of the specified object.
The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object.
Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
The new value of the element at `index`.
Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
The value of the element to remove at `index`.
Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which `oldValue` can be found.
The value to replace with `newValue`.
The new value of the element at `index`.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific schema from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to remove.
To be added.
